body.name: 34in TV Cord Hider for Wall Mounted TV, Large Cord Cover Wall, Cable Hider TV Cable Management Kit, TV Wire Hider for Wall, White Cable Raceway Cable Cover, Cable Concealer 2 xL17in, W2in xH0.7in
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 20 mins
features: Enhanced Safety and Quality: Made from new eco-friendly PVC material with an odorless, pure color; Achieves the highest fire-resistant UL94 V-0 rating for superior safety. ZhiYo CMR03 Large Cord Hider ensures lasting durability without yellowing over time

Upgraded Wider - Wall Cable Management for 7+ Cables: W 2in x H 0.7in, extra-large capacity to hold 8 HDMI cables (for reference); Length 2 x 17in, total length 34in. Smooth edge that can be seamlessly connected

Complete TV Cable Hider Wall Kit: Comes with 8 sets of nails and anchors and 4 PCS adhesive strips. This TV wire cover is perfect for any multi-cable clutter of TVs, DVD players, and speakers, in a home theater or entertainment system

Easy to Install: Provides two installation methods(Nails or Tape) for your convenience. Each base has 4 pre-drilled nail holes, which can be installed in a few minutes. When dealing with multiple cables, using nails for installation would be more reliable

Easy to Use: Double-sided snap-on design, no popping out the cord cover when the cable is fully loaded. Easy to remove cords for maintenance, either hinging or sliding it off. After adding a new cable, press gently, and a click shows it has perfectly locked

Stylish & Cuttable Cable Concealer Kit: The corners of our wall cord concealer are curved to blend in with any decor. It can also be easily cut with a hacksaw and painted in any color for a perfect blend with the wall

Tape Usage Precautions: Apply tape only on dust-free and smooth walls; Tape usage may result in peeling off wall paint when removed; For those concerned, recommend using nails for installation; Strong adhesive tape, suggesting the use of 3 sections of 4-inch tape for each 17-inch channel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They're super easy to put up. They match the paint on my wall perfect . They definitely perform their task. They stick to the wall rather well. But please don't make the mistake I did I put the permanent side against the wall which will result in a wall repair LOL. They definitely were worth the money and they hold the cords beautifully

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job perfectly
reviews.reviewText: This cord cover did the job wonderfully. It made a huge difference aesthetically. It was easy to install. I used 3m command strips instead of the screws that came with it. The width of it allowed it to easily include all four of the cords that I was trying to hide, and the two pieces align seamlessly to keep it looking like one long piece. Overall, it's a great product that I am so pleased with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install. Looks great. Hides cords well. It does exactly what I need it to do and without any drilling required!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like that these are on screw on! Look at what happened with another brand that was stick on
reviews.reviewText: Bought this especially because they were screw into the wall. The description in the photos is accurate regarding avoiding greater losses. Was totally why I got these. Another brand we had for while we got before was stick on. While the installation was much easier to do on the stick on one, it destroyed our wall taking it off. We were painting anyway but the repair would be a lot easier for a couple holes in the wall vs ripping the drywall off with the other brand. Painted to match the wall. Worked great. The plastic anchors were not that good, thin, bent easily, and had to use a some better ones I had on hand. Could have been longer too. Otherwise I would have given five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install Cable Conduit
reviews.reviewText: Was a breeze to install. I replaced the tape sent with Command Strips which worked beautifully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Easy to cut to length and organize wires.
reviews.reviewText: Like everything. Allows for more wires than I had expected. No unsightly, distracting wires. If I need to change my layout, I can snap it open, switch out wires, and snap it shut without detaching from wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Cord Cover
reviews.reviewText: I updated my TV which necessitated a larger cord cover. This one worked perfectly, adheres real well to the wall and once I painted it to match the wall, I barely know its there. Plus, the price was incredible and this is a well-made product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use and looks good
Quick and easy way to hide some wires.
reviews.reviewText: This was a perfect, easy solution if you want to hide some wires without going to the hardware store. Simply remove the tape on the back to reveal the adhesive, and apply to a clean wall. You're then able to open the entire tube and place the wires in. Then simply click it shut, and you're finished. A perfect easy solution to clean up the area surrounding a mounted television.The only issue is that it doesn't provide too much length. Coming in at 31.5 inches, you may need to buy more than one if your television is mounted up high. Luckily they fit together in a modular fashion, so you can buy multiple packs to fit together for one use.
Brilliant idea. Easy to install & hide ugly cables. Recommend for multiple use in offices & entertainment media center

reviews.reviewTitle: I had no idea how to use this but the seller made it very easy!
reviews.reviewText: I really didn't know what to expect when it arrived. I had never used something like this and I'm admittedly far from a 'handyman'. It was so simple and within 30 seconds, all cords were hidden inside of a stylish, matching product. Very happy and highly recommend.
Great product which was easy to use and hid my ugly wires
The colour and quality are superb. It met its purpose. exceeded my expectations.
